t: The Amazon Slogan - Meaning, Facts And Branding Benefits
s: July 25, 2024 - The “Work Hard” part in Amazon’s slogan underlines this. From a garage full of desks made from doors that sold books online to the earth’s largest eCommerce store, Bezos has worked hard to climb up the ladder. No wonder he wants all his employees to do the same, thus highlighting the company’s culture in its slogan! It’s important to have fun ...
